name: Guacamole With Fermented Chili Bean Paste
description: Fermented chili bean paste gives traditional guac a boost of spicy, salty, tangy flavor.
recipeIngredient: 1 to 2 tablespoons Chinese fermented chili bean paste

recipeInstructions.text: Combine guacamole with chili-bean paste to taste. Fold in scallions. Transfer to a serving bowl and drizzle with chili oil. Serve immediately with warm tortilla chips.
